text: Rūpañca hidaṃ bhikkhave attā abhavissa nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyya labbhetha ca rūpe evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī ti
edit: Rūpañca hidaṃ bhikkhave attā abhavissa nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyya labbhetha ca rūpe – evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī ti

translations.transtext: If this form, monks, was the self, this form would not exist for illness, and [you] might obtain the form thus, "May my form be in this way, may my form not have been in this way."
